Event.name: Arson
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Perpetrator</fen> intentionally sets fire to his own or someone else's property, often in order to collect an insurance payment on this property.
<ex><fex name="Perpetrator">Two men</fex> were charged with <fex name="Offense"><t>arson</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an event occurs</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Depictive</fen> identifies a phrase that describes the actor of an action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Offense
Arg.definition: <def-root>The illegal setting of fire to destroy something.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an action is performed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which arson is committed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action that the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> is trying to accomplish with the arson <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex><t>Arson</t> <fex name="Purp">for insurance fraud</fex> is quite common.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Duration</fen> of time that a state holds or a process is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the arson occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the arson occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Perpetrator
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Perpetrator</fen> sets fire to a building in order to gain some benefit from so doing. <ex><fex name="Perpetrator">The two men</fex> were charged with <t>arson</t> when found running from the burning factory.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Victim</fen> identifies the enity that is negatively effected by the arson. <ex>There has been an increase in the number of <t>arson</t> attacks <fex name="Victim">on local schools</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The frequency with which an act of arson is committed.
<ex>The churches were plagued with <fex name="Freq">frequent</fex> <t>arson</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: arson.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the criminal act of deliberately setting fire to property.

lexUnit.name: arsonist.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the criminal who deliberately set things on fire
